duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide collaboration/leadership to employees across various entities within the organization, driving HR activities that align with business strategy and human capital strategy.

Consult on HR generalist, operational, and analytical activities including employee relations, compensation, workforce planning/talent acquisition, employee development and engagement, organizational design, and culture.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience required. 5+ years relevant work experience and 2+ years working in the Healthcare industry required. 1 year of experience in leadership capacity.
